sqlMap.update: UPDATE NOTICE_BOARD SET NOTICE_TITLE = #noticeTitle# , NOTICE_CONTENT = #noticeContent# , NOTICE_DATE = SYSDATE , ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# WHERE NOTICE_NM = #noticeNm#
